formulas.name: fv_TaskCreated
formulas.expression: "Hi," &BR() + "You have been assigned a new Task . Please click below link" &BR() + {!$Label.SalesforceUrl}&{!$Record.Id}

formulas.name: fv_test_child
formulas.expression: if ({!mdv_AfterTaskCloseProcess} = true,'true','false') + ' and ' + text({!$Record.Status}) + ' and ' + text({!$Record__Prior.Status}) + ' and ' + if ({!$Record__Prior.All_Child_Tasks_Closed__c} = true, 'true','false') + ' and ' + if({!$Record.All_Child_Tasks_Closed__c} = true,'true','false')
